content.p: In the UK almost everyone in any kind of work is entitled to basic working rights. However, there are exceptions so please explore the information we link to carefully. You can also seek advice from: If you are employed under a contract of employment then you gain additional rights, but these do not come into effect until you have worked for a specific length of time. For example, the following entitlements come into effect gradually over the first two years of your employment: telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
